about

home about notes read photos

Hey there, I'm Whitney. This is my tiny slice of the internet,
there's not much here right now, but thats alright.
Maybe one day it will be full! Full of what? I don't know.
Words? Pictures? Tiny, shimmering thoughts?
A few little rules for your visit:

  • No stomping on other people's dreams (or their imaginary gardens).
  • Take what inspires you, but don't take what isn't yours.
    Admire, appreciate, but no pocketing the shiny things.
  • No meanies, no grumps, no joy-stealers.
  • If you're going to critique, do it like a friendly ghost—gently,
    kindly, with good intentions.
  • Typos are just words being a little whimsical. Let them be.
  • Bring good energy. Curiosity, wonder,
    kindness—like bringing flowers to a friend's house.
  • And most of all—enjoy. This space is here for a reason,
    and maybe that reason is you.

That's all. That's it. Stay as long as you like.

"I am that mysterious stranger that I hoped to meet.
I met her at a dark dance.
We came here to live together until I could stay by myself.
The place is here. The time is now.
This is all my lifetime.”
― Jenny Slate, Little Weirds
